      • testLime

        public void testLime()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     SubtitleDecoderException
        Regression test for devices on JellyBean where some named colors are not correctly defined on framework level. Tests that lime resolves to #FF00FF00 not #00FF00.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if reading subtitle file fails.
        SubtitleDecoderException
        See Also:
        JellyBean Color Kitkat Color
